modName: Enchantable Telvanni Robes and Dunmer Outfits
summary: Adds unenchanted Telvanni Robes, Dunmer Outfits and Temple Priest Robes to the game.
descriptionHtml:
[b]***Requires Dragonborn DLC to work***[/b]

This mod adds both enchanted and unenchanted Telvanni Robes to Neloth. After reaching a certain level, you can buy Telvanni Robes with the same enchantment as the Master Robes.
Furthermore, you can buy Dunmer Outfits from Fethis Alor in Raven Rock, they also come in both enchanted and unenchanted versions.
[b]Update 1.1.0:[/b] Fethis Alor now sells Temple Priest Robes, Hoods and Shoes.

All the robes spawn randomly, it\'s possible that the merchant doesn\'t have the desired ones. In this case you have to wait a few days for new items to spawn.
author: Rangarig

files.name: Telvanni Robes
files.changelogHtml: Added Temple Robes (both enchanted and unenchanted), Hood and Shoes to Fethis Alor
